info.brief_description: An interactive adventure about your favorite stallions from MLP.
info.description:
Welcome to Gay Stallions are Gassy; an interactive adventure about your favorite stallions from all around Equestria.

1- Scat is permited

2- Hyper is also permited

3- If your path is going into another fetish (Like WG or Hyper Gassiness; or just Hyper), make it clear in the option selection. For example:

> Eat the berries (Hyper)

> Run away

4- Put some efford into the writting; I've seen that some people just leave a few lines of story. I apreciate you trying to add to the story, I really do, but seriously, just put some efford into it.

5- Females characters are not allowed; they can appear in the stories, but they can not be the main character nor have sexual interaction with them
info.pretty_title: My Little Pony: Gay Stallion Are Gassy
